full_summary:
##Supply and Delivery of a High Temperature Pressure Reactor

###Request for Proposal

The Government of Canada invites bids from qualified contractors for the supply and delivery of a high temperature pressure reactor. 

####Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3737607635
* **Publication Date**: 2022-11-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-08 14:00:00 (EDT)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)

####Description

The Department of Natural Resources Canada requires a high temperature pressure reactor to simulate high-temperature high-pressure chemical processes.

####Evaluation Criteria

Bidders must demonstrate compliance with the mandatory technical evaluation criteria, as detailed in the tender documents.

#### Important Notes

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before 2022-12-08, 14:00:00 (EDT).

####Communication

For inquiries or clarification, please contact Crystal Denton, Crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. The contact information is also included in the tender documents.

####Attachments

The tender documents do not include any attachments.

Note: I made some minor changes to meet the word limit of 400 words. Let me know if you need any further adjustments.  Enjoy!  Futher modifications are welcome.
